Text: Love these hd quality vids. Thanx dude
Np enjoy, think i'll start removing the black bars for videos that are not a 16:9 ratio.

Good idea, gives a better look for the videos. Once again, great release, uploading them as usual! btw, are you going to do some classics as well? Like Johnny Cash - Hurt, Kanye West - Drive Slow and the list goes on... don't want to be so forward, but I would love to see some of does videos's up.
I do take requests, but i can't always guarantee that i'll be able to get it, i just pop the song on my list and keep an eye out on it.
keep up the good work dude!
